General.Name: Future Corporation
General.Description: Future Corporation provides IT consulting and services primarily in Japan. It also offers its services in digital marketing, IT education, e-commerce, and other fields. The company was formerly known as Future Architect, Inc. and changed its name to Future Corporation in April 2016. Future Corporation was incorporated in 1989 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
General.Address: Art Village Osaki Central Tower, Tokyo, Japan, 141-0032

3.Name: Mr. Kunihito  Ishibashi
3.Title: Exec. SVP, Chief Information Security & Innovation Officer and Director
